description: NTS Map: 092G02Peggy Moire, continuing with her list of walks and hikes ideal for seniors, adds this walk close to the US border.- ?very nice?, park at the top of the basin, lake is below- Peggy has often done the horse trail because it is a little longer, but the main trails are fine.- features Bog, open spots, water, lots to seeTo get there, basically drive to the Border on 99 and take thelast intersection before the border, turn east.  From the Trans Canada Highway, take the Langlely take the langely exit 200th st exit Sothbound.  Travel 14.5 km turning east on 16th for the North Valley Entrance.
title: Campbell Valley Walk
